CustomField.description: This field is checked when a Cal Atlas user manually adds a Violation Accounting Code to a Case Issue. These have to be reported to DIR Accounting separately to ensure they are recorded in CalSTARS.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box when you manually add a Violation Accounting Code to a Case Issue, so that it can be reported to DIR Accounting separately to ensure they are recorded in CalSTARS.
CustomField.label: Added Manually
